name: CG
author: Miki Sayaka
summary: The world has been plunged into chaos by the endless greed of the Britannian Empire! But with the rise of Zero, there is hope for the rebellion! Yet, the alliances of this world are not so black-and-white. As each person has their own fears and desires, each character has their own enemies and allies! [First time playing? Try this guide: http://pokemon-online.eu/threads/theme-guides.30711/#post-433771]

tips.Win Conditions: Unlike Village vs Mafia and Factional setups, this theme involves role-specific Win Conditions. You win once your role's enemies are defeated.
tips.Allies: Try to make alliances with other roles with whom you share a common enemy!
tips.Vote: Lelouch can Promote anyone (including himself) to give them +3 votes. He can also Demote anyone to give them -3 votes. Charles can take someone's vote away altogether.
tips.Exposes: Lelouch's Exposes may be fake. C.C.'s Exposes look just like Lelouch's but are always fake.
tips.Mechas: Kallen and Suzaku both can convert into the following forms (you can use the actions of the form you are in the same night you change).
tips.Recon: In Recon, one of them can Scout someone to learn if they are an enemy or ally. However, another player in Recon will appear as an Ally.
tips.Radiant: Radiant form can kill during the Night, and counters Daykills.
tips.Flight: Flight form can kill during the Day. Suzaku's Flight evades Kallen's Flight.

sides.winmsg: ±Victory: ~Players~ have all overcome their enemies! Now everyone can work together to rebuild the world in a time of peace.
±Victory: ~Players~ have all overcome their enemies! Now everyone can work together to rebuild the world in a time of peace.
Wait, how did the civilians end up the last people alive? Oh well, ~Players~ used all the data to build really cool robots.

nightcounter.hookermsg: You tried to attack Mao during the night. He read your mind from 100 yards away and killed you first!

inspectDie.targetmsg: You discovered ~Self~'s hiding place! Defenseless, they surrendered!
inspectDie.msg: You were discovered by your enemy! Defenseless, you surrendered!

killedByVilletta.msg: Villetta was able to put you into a weird machine to remove your Geass powers and kill you!

plDie.targetmsg: You cornered Mao. Such a shame you had to kill him.
plDie.msg: C.C.! You really did care after all! ... *gasp*

variables.lelouch_tutorial: Use /promote to give yourself a vote of 3, or /demote to trick your opponents into voting you with negative votes! Charles cannot be affected by your promote or demote. You can expose someone, and if you find an ally, be sure to /whisper to them! You can also use a fake expose to confuse your enemies. /Protect yourself, unless you found an important ally who needs protection! You can protect multiple people per turn, but you will run out of them pretty quickly if you do.
variables.suzaku_tutorial: Kallen shares the same forms (Recon, Radiant, and Flight) as you, but her kill is faster than yours, meaning she is more dangerous when she is in Radiant form. You evade her kills if you are in Flight form, so you can win a duel in the air. You need to be in Radiant in order to defeat Toudou. You can use actions the same night you convert.
variables.kallen_tutorial: Suzaku shares the same forms (Recon, Radiant, and Flight) as you, but he evades your daykill when he is in Flight form, so he is more dangerous during the day. Your radiant kill is faster however. You must be Flight form in order to defeat Xingke. You can use actions the same night you convert.
variables.schneizel_tutorial: If you poison someone who turns out to be your teammate, you should /detox them to remove the poison. Otherwise, they might try to kill you in order to heal themselves since you detox everyone when you die. Use /redirect [target]@[target2] to mess with players' protects and inspects. Most importantly, you can steal Lelouch's protect and force him to protect you! Your poison takes TWO NIGHTS to kill.
variables.charles_tutorial: You can win by voting off your enemies. If you brainwash someone, they can't vote you back! If it says '[Role] appears to be suffering from aftermath of Charles' brainwash', you should /restore the person you brainwashed the previous night in addition to brainwashing someone else. Your Brainwash will overwrite Lelouch's promote (which can give him or another player 3 votes), but he can overwrite your brainwash the next day with promote.
variables.cornelia_tutorial: You are a risk/reward role, since your vote of 4 gets halved every time you kill during the night. YOU SHOULD ONLY KILL IF YOU KNOW YOU ARE AIMING AT AN ENEMY! Otherwise, you risk being voted off by Lelouch. Be careful, as Lelouch can also make your vote become -3 with his /demote.
variables.xingke_tutorial: You are a basic inspector, but you can also eliminate your enemies by killing during the day. Wait until you have enough information to make educated kills, because if you kill an ally, you will lose your daykill permanently! Until then, work together with allies like Lelouch and Suzaku to get rid of threats like Schneizel and Toudou. Be careful, as if Kallen is in her Radiant form, she will counter your daykill!
variables.toudou_tutorial: You are a basic inspector, but you can also eliminate your enemies by killing during the day. Wait until you have enough information to make educated kills, because if you kill an ally, you will lose your daykill permanently! Until then, work together with allies like Lelouch and Kallen to get rid of threats like Cornelia and Xingke.
variables.cc_tutorial: Your most important ally is Lelouch, as he is the only way you can defeat Charles. Confuse other players during the day by using a fake expose (like /kallen or /suzaku). Lelouch will not be confused, as he knows that his is the true one!
variables.milly_tutorial: All you have to do to win is get voted off. Seems counterintuitive, right? Try voting people who you think will be likely to vote you back!
variables.mao_tutorial: You can kill, but that doesn't mean you SHOULD! Lelouch can find out who you are and put a quick end to you if you do. Work together with Schneizel to remove Lelouch's protection and then kill him, to be safe. You cannot be voted off unless Charles or Lelouch ruins you with their Geass, so keep that in mind.
variables.kaguya_tutorial: You should connect with people who you think are your allies. When you connect with Suzaku or Ougi, you can daykill, and when you connect with Lelouch he promotes you. You start off brainwashed. You can connect with people who have already won.
variables.anya_tutorial: You should connect with people who you think are your allies. When you connect with C.C. or Orange, you can daykill, and when you connect with Lelouch he promotes you. You start off brainwashed. You can connect with people who have already won.
variables.vv_tutorial: Lay low and try not to draw attention to yourself early on. Block dangerous daykillers with /distract, and later on in the game, you will be nearly unstoppable!
variables.milly_help: You are the fearsome and powerful president of the Student Coucil at Ashford Academy! You don't care for war, but you'd take any excuse to have a little fun! All you have to do to win is get voted off during the day. However, you cannot count on anyone to do this by asking them, because a random person who lynches you will die! Just for the fun of it, you are exposed as a random character, but your vote doesn't actually count for anything :(
variables.milly_help2: ±Win Condition: You must get voted off during the day.
variables.milly_info: Vote counts as 0 (even if Promoted/Demoted). If Exposed, appears as random. Wins if lynched during the day, but a random person to lynch her dies.

millyWin.convertmsg: ~Self~: Well, it looks like my work here is done. Milly Ashford has successfully pulled off the biggest prank the academy has ever seen!

killVoters.message: ±BANG: Everyone thought Milly's prank was hilarious, except for ~Target~, who died.

variables.diethard_help: History is always written by the winners! That is the motto you live by. Choose a winner with /Record [name] to become their teammate, allowing you to talk to them with /tt. If they win, then you win alongside them! But if they die, you will perish by their side. Choose your allies wisely! If you don't take anyone's side, you will have a voteshield of +999. If you join someone's side, you can /Inspect during the day!
variables.diethard_help2: ±Win Condition: You must choose an ally with /Record [name] and win alongside them.
variables.diethard_help3: You have joined someone's side! Help them defeat their enemies and you can join them in victory. If you decide they become boring, you can use /Record to join someone else's side!
variables.diethard_help4: ±Win Condition: You must help Milly get voted off during the day!
variables.diethard_info: Can /Record to join someone's side (winning alongside them). If the person they joined dies, Diethard dies as well. If he is on no one's side, voteshield of +999.

variables.toudou_help: You are the legendary Toudou of Miracles! Formerly leader of the Four Holy Swords, you are now a General in Japanese Liberation War! You have a deadly combination of sharp wits and physical strength, so you can /Inspect [name] once during the Night, and if you did not inspect the previous night, during the day you can and /Kill [name] during the day. You can use this as many times as you want during the day, but if you ever hit an ally, your daykilling days will be over. Additionally you evade Suzaku when he kills during the day.
variables.toudou_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Cornelia, Suzaku, Villetta, V.V., and Xingke.
variables.toudou_info: Can Inspect during the Night. Hax on kill. If he did not inspect the previous night, can Kill during the day (45% chance to reveal) unlimited times but loses this ability if he kills an ally. Evades Suzaku's daykills. Wins when Cornelia, Suzaku, Villetta, V.V., and Xingke are defeated.

variables.xingke_help: Ever loyal to your Empress, you have entered the Japanese Liberation War to defend all things kind and just. A courageous and creative tactician, you can use your abilities to /Inspect [name] during the Night. On days after you did not inspect, you can use /Kill [name] during the Day! You can kill as many times as you want, but if you kill an ally, you will lose this ability altogether. Additionally, you evade Kallen when she nightkills.
variables.xingke_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Kallen, C.C., Nunnally, Schneizel, V.V., and Toudou.
variables.xingke_info: Can Inspect during the Night. Hax on kill. If he does not inspect the previous night, can Kill during the day (20% chance to reveal) unlimited times but loses this ability if he kills an ally. Evades Kallen's nightkills. Wins when Kallen, C.C., V.V., Schneizel, and Toudou are defeated.

variables.ougi_help: You were once a teacher, but times have changed, and now you are the leader of the Japanese Resistance Cell! It's up to you to /Stalk [name] to learn what they did during the night! Team up with your ally Kallen and and /Protect [name] her during the night; if she is successful in defeating Suzaku, you will gain a nightkill!
variables.ougi_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Cornelia, Suzaku, Orange, Villetta, and Anya.
variables.ougi_help3: Alright! With Suzaku defeated, you've gained reinforcements, and you can /Kill [name] during the Night! Continue to /Stalk [name] and /Protect [name] your ally!
variables.ougi_info: Can Stalk. Can Protect one person during the night. Gains a nightkill and ignores Distract once Suzaku is defeated but loses protect. Can hax Recon/Radiant/Flight form changes. Wins when Cornelia, Orange, Villetta, Suzaku, and Anya are defeated.
variables.orange_help: Jeremiah Gottwald?? Who could that be, your name is Orange! It's up to you to defend your honor and use your Geass Canceller to /Revert [name] to change people's vote back to whatever it was originally, undoing any of Lelouch's or Charles' Geasses. This will also tell you their role if they had been manipulated previously! Team up with your former rival, Suzaku, and /Protect [name] him during the night; if he is successful in defeating Kallen, you will gain a nightkill which can kill even immortal beings like Charles and even defeat Mao!
variables.orange_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Charles, Mao, Ougi, Kallen, and C.C..
variables.orange_help3: Now it's settled! With Kallen defeated, you've gained reinforcements, and you can /Kill [name] during the Night, even if the target is supposedly immortal! Continue to use your Geass Canceller to undo any vote manipulations with /Revert [name] and /Protect your allies!
variables.orange_info: Can Revert someone's vote to what it was originally during the Night (this inspects the target if they were affected by Lelouch/Charles). This also blocks Mao's scan. Can Protect one person during the night. Gains a nightkill which can kill immunes and counters once Kallen is defeated and loses protect. Can hax Recon/Radiant/Flight form changes. Wins when Charles, Ougi, Mao, Kallen, and C.C. are defeated.

orangeRevert.guardmsg: Orange's Geass prevented you from Scanning ~Target~!
orangeRevert.usermsg: You reverted the Geass on ~Target~! ~Target~ (~New~) thanks you!

orangeKill.msg: You were no match for Jeremiah Gottwald!

variables.tamaki_help: You are just the average Joe at the Black Knights, but that doesn't stop you from talking like you're hot stuff. Type /Poison [name] and /Detox [name] on alternating nights to defeat your enemies and save your allies! You can also use /Meet [name] to learn someone's identity, but they will also know that you learned their identity.
variables.tamaki_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate C.C., Cornelia, Nunnally, and Villetta.
variables.tamaki_info: Can Poison or Detox someone during alternate nights. Can Meet one person during the night (learns identity, but reveals user). Wins when C.C., Cornelia, Schneizel, and Villetta are defeated.
variables.villetta_help: Although you are not of Britannian descent, you have always driven for more power and security. As an expert in intelligence, you can find out several happenings during the night. Type /Eliminate [name]:[role] to get rid of your enemies - this will even work on C.C. - but beware of Lelouch's protects. If Ougi protects you, you will join his cause!
variables.villetta_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate C.C., Lelouch, Ougi, Anya, and Toudou.
variables.villetta_help3: Now that Ougi has befriended you, you no longer have to eliminate him! Although you are not of Britannian descent, you have always driven for more power and security. As an expert in intelligence, you can find out several happenings during the night. Type /Eliminate [name]:[role] to get rid of your enemies - this will even work on C.C. - but beware of Lelouch's protects.
variables.villetta_help4: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate C.C., Lelouch, Anya, and Toudou.
variables.villetta_info: Can Eliminate (pinpoint kill that can kill C.C.) one person during the night after night 1. Haxes protect, promote, and demote (can't find user), inspect, and distract. Evades 1 nightkill per game. Joins Ougi as an ally if protected by him while he cannot kill. Wins when C.C., Lelouch, Ougi, Anya, and Toudou are defeated.

villettaEliminate.pinpointFailMsg: You couldn't eliminate ~Target~... they can't be ~GuessedRole~.

evade1kill.evadechargemsg: Someone tried to kill you! You were able to survive once due to the amazing Britannian medicine!

villettaEliminateInit.pinpointFailMsg: You couldn't eliminate ~Target~... they can't be ~GuessedRole~.

commonMeet.dummy4targetmsg: ~Self~: Why, hello there. I've just investigated your role! (Hint: this is either Tamaki or Villetta!

variables.schneizel_help: The Cold-Blooded Prince of Britannia, you are manipulative and ruthless to no end. Your underhanded tactics let you /poison two people during the night, killing them two days later. They can only be cured by your merciful /detox, or by your unfortunate demise. Your perceptiveness allows you to find out who is targeting whom, and you can take advantage of this by using /Redirect [name]@[name] to control your enemies!
variables.schneizel_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate C.C., Lelouch, Charles, Kaguya and Xingke.
variables.schneizel_help3: Now that Zero has exposed you before everyone, you can no longer move freely; it has become impossible to /redirect anymore. Your underhanded tactics let you /poison two people during the night, killing them two days later. They can only be cured by your merciful /detox, or by your unfortunate demise.
variables.schneizel_info: Can Redirect 1 person's action during the Night (works on Inspect, Protect, Distract, Kill). Haxes Inspect, Protect, Distract, and Kill. Can poison 2 people during the night (count: 2). Can detox one person during the night. Detoxes everyone on death. Evades 1 expose. If exposed (not fake), loses his ability to /redirect. Wins when Lelouch, Tamaki, Kaguya, Charles, C.C., and Xingke are defeated.

schneizelEvade.msg: ~Target~ slipped away before you could expose them! They must be Schneizel!
schneizelEvade.targetmsg: Zero tried to expose you, but you were too quick...

schneizelWasPLed.identifymsg: Schneizel outwitted you, and you found yourself unable to use any night actions!

variables.cornelia_help: The Second Princess of the Britannian Imperial Family and a powerful field commander, you can have strength either on the battlefield or in the political landscape! Your voice is heard throughout the world, so your vote will count as 4, but every time you get your hands dirty and /Kill [name] during the Night, your vote will be halved! Each time you kill, your chances of piercing will also be increased, with the last kill piercing Protect 75% of the time! Your tactical skills also allow you to /Safeguard [name] during the Night.
variables.cornelia_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Kallen, Lelouch, Toudou, Ougi, and Kaguya.
variables.cornelia_info: Vote counts as 4. Can Kill, which halves her vote (4, 2, 1, 0.5) but increases pierce chance (0%, 30%, 60%, 90%). Can Safeguard twice per night (blocks Poison, Detox, Scout, Distract, Scan, Inspect). Wins when Kallen, Lelouch, Ougi, Kaguya, and Toudou are defeated.

corneliaKillFinal.dummyusermsg: Your vote is still now at its minimum, but your pierce chance is now 100%!

corneliaSafeguard.guardmsg: You couldn't use your action on ~Target~ because of a Safeguard!

nunnallySafeguard.guardmsg: You couldn't use your action on ~Target~ because of a Safeguard!

variables.kallen_help: The ace pilot of the Black Knights, that's you! Use your incredible Knightmare combat skills to defeat your enemies! In /Recon mode, you can use /Scout [name] to learn whether or not someone is your enemy, and additionally you will evade nightkills. In /Radiant mode, you can /Kill [name] during the Night, and you will counter any Daykills, but you have a 50% chance of your vote failing and counting for 0. In /Flight mode, you will be able to kill during the day (you may be revealed).
variables.kallen_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Suzaku, Orange, Cornelia, Anya, and Xingke.
variables.kallen_info: [Recon] Can /Scout to learn if someone is an enemy. Evades Nightkills. Appears as friendly to other recon. Voteshield of -1. [Radiant] Can kill during the Night. Counters daykills. Vote has a 50% chance to fail. [Flight] Can daykill (60% chance to reveal). Wins when Suzaku, Cornelia, Orange, Anya, and Xingke are defeated.
variables.kallenRadiantDayCounterMsg: ~Target~ tried to attack Kallen with her Guren in Radiant form! She blocked the attack with ease and melted them with its microwave arm!
variables.kallenToRecon: You have shifted modes on the Guren! You are now in Recon mode, so you can /Scout [name] during the Night to learn if someone is an enemy or an ally! You also evade nightkills and have a voteshield of -1.
variables.kallenToRadiant: You have shifted modes on the Guren! You are now in Radiant mode, so you can /Kill [name] during the Night to eliminate another player! Because of your powerful microwave arm, you will counter anyone who tries to kill you during the Day. However, your vote has a 50% chnance of failing!
variables.kallenToFlight: You have shifted modes on the Guren! You are now in Flight mode, so you can /Kill [name] during the Day to eliminate another player! You have a 60% chance of being revealed, and you cannot kill Suzaku if he is in Flight!

variables.suzaku_help: You are the White Knight of Britannia, the expert Devicer of the Lancelot! Use your incredible Knightmare combat skills to defeat your enemies! In /Recon mode, you can use /Scout [name] to learn whether or not someone is your enemy, and additionally evade nightkills and have a voteshield of -1. In /Radiant mode, you can /Kill [name] during the Night, and you will counter any Daykills, but your vote with fail and count as 0 50% of the time. In /Flight mode, you will be able to kill during the day - you may be revealed, but you cannot be killed by Kallen in Flight mode.
variables.suzaku_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Charles, Ougi, Kallen, Mao, and Toudou.
variables.suzaku_info: [Recon] Can /Scout to learn if someone is an enemy. Evades Nightkills. Appears as friendly to other recon. Voteshield of -1. [Radiant] Can kill during the Night. Counters daykills. Vote has a 50% chance to fail. [Flight] Can daykill (70% chance to reveal) and cannot be daykilled by Kallen's Flight mode. Wins when Kallen, Charles, Mao, Ougi, and Toudou are defeated.
variables.suzakuFlightDayCounterMsg: Kallen tried to attack Suzaku while in his Flight form! She was doing pretty well, too, until that SPINKICK!
variables.suzakuRadiantDayCounterMsg: ~Target~ tried to attack Suzaku while in his Radiant form! They were doing pretty well, too, until that SPINKICK!
variables.suzakuToRecon: You have shifted modes on the Lancelot! You are now in Recon mode, so you can /Scout [name] during the Night to learn if someone is an enemy or an ally! You now evade nightkills and have a voteshield of -1.

variables.lelouch_help: You go by many names: Lelouch Lamperouge, Lelouch vi Britannia, Zero. The exiled prince with a thirst for vendetta, you can use the power of Geass to deliver chaos to the world! Type /Promote [name] or /Demote [name] to give someone a vote of 3 or -3 respectively (they won't know their vote was affected, and you CAN USE IT ON YOURSELF). As the brightest student in Japan, you can use your intelligence to /Protect yourself, or anyone else, during the Night, up to 5 times per game. During the day, you can appear as Zero and expose (or fake-expose) someone's identity, and you will kill anyone who dares try to attack you!
variables.lelouch_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Cornelia, Schneizel, Charles, Villetta, and Mao.
variables.lelouch_info: Knows Nunnally on startup. Can Promote or Demote one person during the Night, changing their Vote to 3 or -3 respectively. Can Protect any (5 times per game, may be used on same night). Can Expose during the day (may be fake). Ignores Distract. Counters daykills. Haxes kill and distract. Wins when Cornelia, Schneizel, Charles, Villetta, and Mao are eliminated.
variables.lelouchCounterMsg: The only ones who should kill, are those who are prepared to be killed! Lelouch flips off his mask, activates his Geass, and commands the attacker to kill themselves!

lelouchPromote.inputmsg: Lelouch vi Britannia commands ~Target~... vote with a power of 3!

lelouchDemote.inputmsg: Lelouch vi Britannia commands ~Target~... vote with a power of -3!

variables.kaguya_help: You are the young head mistress of the Kyoto House, Kaguya Sumeragi! You support the Black Knights, but you also have compassion for your cousin, Suzaku! Type /protect [name] up to 5 times during the night per game to protect yourself or someone else. During the day, you can /connect [name] to find out someone's role! If you find Lelouch, he will automatically promote you, giving you a vote of 3, and if you find Suzaku or Ougi, you can immediately /kill [name] during the day once!
variables.kaguya_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Anya, V.V., Schneizel, Charles, and Cornelia.
variables.kaguya_help3: You can now /kill [name] during the day due to finding an ally! You are the young head mistress of the Kyoto House, Kaguya Sumeragi! You support the Black Knights, but you also have compassion for your cousin, Suzaku! Type /protect [name] up to 5 times during the night per game to protect yourself or someone else. During the day, you can /connect [name] to find out someone's role! If you find Lelouch, he will automatically promote you, giving you a vote of 3!
variables.kaguya_info: Can Protect 5 people during the game at night (may be used on the same night). Can /connect during the day to learn someone's role. If she connects with Lelouch, she becomes promoted. If she connects with Suzaku or Ougi, she can daykill once. Begins the game brainwashed. Wins when Anya, V.V., Charles, Cornelia, and Schneizel are defeated.

variables.charles_help: You are the Emperor of Britannia, Charles zi Britannia! Your word is law, so you can use the powers you gained from V.V. to /brainwash one player during the Night to prevent them from voting or resisting votes! If you brainwash someone, they will have a chance to reveal their role to you during the day if they are not your enemy, so you can later cancel this with /Restore [name]! You cannot be killed during the Night, so you must simply survive to lynch your enemies!
variables.charles_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Lelouch, Orange, Schneizel, Kaguya, and Suzaku.
variables.charles_info: Can Brainwash one person during the Night, preventing them from voting and removing their voteshield (brainwashed roles can reveal their role to Charles if not his enemy). Can also Restore to reverse that. Immune to nightkills. Immune to Lelouch's Promote/Demote. Wins when Lelouch, Orange, Suzaku, Kaguya, and Schneizel are defeated.

charlesSilence.dummy4targetmsg: You have been brainwashed by Charles!

reveal.msg: You have been brainwashed by Charles! Type /reveal to let him know what role you are!
reveal.revealmsg: ~Role~ appears to be suffering from the aftermath of Charles' Brainwash power!

variables.vv_help: You have the power of Geass! Work together with your long time friend Charles to rid the world of evil. Use /Distract [name] to prevent someone from taking actions during the day! Everytime someone dies, your vote will be increased, but at the beginning, it only counts as 0.
variables.vv_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Mao, Kaguya, Xingke, Toudou, and C.C..
variables.vv_info: Can Distract (blocks day actions). Vote counts as 0, but is increased every time any other role dies. Immune to nightkills and poison. Immune to all Geass. Wins when Mao, Kaguya, Xingke, Toudou, and C.C. are defeated.

vvDistract.dayDistractMsg: V.V. possessed your mind and paralyed you from within! You cannot take actions during the day!

variables.cc_help: The Immortal Witch with a mysterious past, you have stealth in spades! This allows you to /Distract [name] every night, but you cannot distract the same person two nights in a row. You are used to filling the role of Zero, so you can pretend to be him and fake an Expose during the Day! This will help Lelouch use his real Expose without drawing attention to his information. Your immortality makes you impossible to kill during the night and harder to poison, and because of you are a kuudere, and everyone you vote for will receive double votes!
variables.cc_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Orange, Villetta, Xingke, V.V., and Schneizel.
variables.cc_help3: The Immortal Witch with a mysterious past, you have stealth in spades! You are now one of Orange's friends due to him protecting you! This allows you to /Distract [name] every night, but you cannot distract the same person two nights in a row. You are used to filling the role of Zero, so you can pretend to be him and fake an Expose during the Day! This will help Lelouch use his real Expose without drawing attention to his information. Your immortality makes you impossible to kill during the night and harder to poison, and because of you are a kuudere, and everyone you vote for will receive double votes!
variables.cc_help4: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Villetta, Xingke, V.V., and Schneizel.
variables.cc_info: Can Distract (may not be used on same role consecutive nights). Can fake any of Lelouch's exposes. Vote doubler. Immune to nightkills. Evades poison once. Immune to Lelouch's Promote/Demote. If protected by Orange while Orange cannot kill, joins Orange as an ally. Wins when Schneizel, Xingke, Orange, V.V., and Villetta are defeated.

evade1.evadechargemsg: Someone tried to poison you! You were able to survive, but the next time you WILL be poisoned!
evade1.msg: ~Self~ (C.C.) proved impossible to poison this time. But not to worry... next time she will not escape your poison!

variables.rolo_help: You are a specialist assassin assigned by the Cult of the Geass. You can use your time-pausing Geass to /Kill [name] during the night, but be warned - every time you use your kill, you will become more exhausted, increasing your chances of dying from overexertion! Your Geass also powers allow you to stay on top of any movement in the night, killing C.C. if she distracts you without a second thought. If you are lynched during the day, you will deftly kill the first person to vote you!
variables.rolo_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate C.C., Orange, Ougi, and Villetta.
variables.rolo_info: Can Kill during the night, with an increasing chance to suicide (0%, 10%, 25%, 50% repeatedly). Changes target to kill C.C. if she Distracts. Counters lynch, but this also increases his next suicide chance by 1 level. Loses lynch counter if he is at 50% suicide rate. Wins when C.C., Orange, Ougi, and Villetta are defeated.
variables.roloSuicidemsg: You died from overexertion as you used your Geass trying to kill someone!

roloChangeTarget.msg: C.C. came to Distract you during the night, so you tried to kill her... and failed!

variables.roloCounterLynchMsg: ~Self~ (Rolo) is recovering from using his Geass...
variables.ripVotersMsg: ~Target~ tried to lynch Rolo, but was suddenly felled by a fatal stab to the chest!
variables.nunnally_help: You are the 87th Successor to the Throne of Britannia, and Lelouch's little sister! Although you have been paralyzed your entire life, you are much stronger than anyone gives you credit for. You have the ability to /Safeguard [name] one person during the night! As a princess with unstoppable moral conviction, your vote counts as 99! But you are cripple by your father's Geass, and currently cannot do anything at all. Work together with your brother, and create a kinder world!
variables.nunnally_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Mao, Ougi, Tamaki, and Xingke.
variables.nunnally_help3: Now that your Geass has been lifted, you have become a powerful leader! Type /Vote [name] during the day to sentence anyone to death with your vote of 99!
variables.nunnally_info: Knows Lelouch on startup. Vote counts as 99. Begins game Brainwashed by Charles. Is unaffected by Promote and Demote. Can Safeguard one person during the night. Wins when Charles, Mao, Ougi, and Xingke are defeated.
variables.mao_help: You're just a poor orphan with dependency issues. Why doesn't anyone understand you? Oh well, they'll understand you a lot better if you chop them up. You can use your mind-reading Geass to /Scan [name] to learn everything that's going on in their mind during the night. You easily counter any kills during the day, and you cannot be lynched during the day either as long as you are unaffected by a Geass! You can /Slice [name] during the night, but Lelouch may hax you. Once Lelouch dies, your vote will be increased to 3!
variables.mao_help2: ±Win Condition: You must eliminate Lelouch, V.V., Anya, Orange, and Suzaku.
variables.mao_help3: You're just a poor orphan with dependency issues. Why doesn't anyone understand you? Oh well, they'll understand you a lot better if you chop them up. Use your mind-reading Geass to /Scan [name] to learn everything that's going on in their mind during the night. You can /Slice [name] during the night, and your vote now counts as 3!
variables.mao_info: Can Scan one person during the night (inspect+watch+learn their vote power). Can slice (kill) during the night. Counters daykills. Cannot be lynched unless he is affected by a Geass. Gains vote of 3 once Lelouch is defeated. Haxes Kill. Wins when Lelouch, Anya, V.V., Orange, and Suzaku are defeated.

variables.lelouchWinMsg: ~Self~: Don't mistake borrowed power for strength. In order to defeat Evil, you must become an even greater Evil! Lelouch vi Britannia has achieved victory!
variables.nunnallyWinMsg: ~Self~: Let's make this world a kinder place. Nunnally vi Britannia has taken her rightful place at the capital of Britannia!
variables.suzakuWinMsg: ~Self~: A victory won through dishonest means is no victory at all. Suzaku Kururugi has defeated his opponents through the power of law and order!
variables.kallenWinMsg: ~Self~: We are the Black Knights - a friend to the weak, a foe to the corrupt! Kallen Kouzuki's enemies have been destroyed!
variables.corneliaWinMsg: ~Self~: They don't call me the Goddess of Victory for nothing. Cornelia li Britannia has reaffirmed her rank as the battlefield's Queen!
variables.charlesWinMsg: ~Self~: Weakness is evil. Power is justice. ALL HAIL BRITANNIA!! Charles zi Britannia has defended his throne from all opposition!
variables.ccWinMsg: ~Self~: The power of Geass sets us apart from the world. Now, C.C. can enjoy all the pizza she wants!
variables.orangeWinMsg: ~Self~: Nothing can endure my STORM OF LOYALTY! Orange-kun has triumphed over his enemies!
variables.schneizelWinMsg: ~Self~: You were all merely pawns in my grand scheme. Schneizel el Britannia has thwarted all of his enemies!
variables.ougiWinMsg: ~Self~: Japan will be liberated - this I swear! Ougi Kaname has defeated his enemies!
variables.toudouWinMsg: ~Self~: This occupation has been overturned! Toudou the Miracle has done it again!
variables.xingkeWinMsg: ~Self~: It seems you're a long way from understanding the Chinese Federation. Xingke has defended his Empress from all threats!
variables.roloWinMsg: ~Self~: To kill. To be killed. This is all I have known. Rolo Lamperouge has successfully completed his hitlist.
variables.maoWinMsg: ~Self~: I don't like it when they think... it's so very noisy. They won't be thinking anymore. Mao's enemies have been made more compact!
variables.tamakiWinMsg: ~Self~: Ha! Watch and learn, this is how you throw a revolution, newbies! Tamaki Shinichiro has somehow outlasted his enemies!
variables.villettaWinMsg: ~Self~: I've destroyed everything in my way. Nothing can threaten my secured position of power now! Villetta Nu has surpassed her competition!
variables.diethardWinMsg: ~Self~: What a glorious victory! This is Diethard, reporting with live coverage of the greatest triumph of our age!
variables.kaguyaWinMsg: ~Self~: Aha, I guess you could call me a Goddess of Victory as well. Prime Minster Kaguya Sumeragi has saved her country from foreign powers!
variables.anyaWinMsg: ~Self~: Oh... I won. I should take a picture to commemorate this moment. Anya won! ... yay?
variables.vvWinMsg: ~Self~: I did it, Brother... Now, let's create a new world together. V.V. has freed the world from chaos and stopped the hands of time!
variables.diethardDeathMsg: ~Target~: ~Self~, you have failed me, and all the viewers who believed in you!

lelouchOnDeath.convertmsg: Come now, Lelouch, surely you never thought you could replace me! Mao's vote is now permanently 3!

suzakuOnDeath.convertmsg: Suzaku's defeat marks the turning point of this battle! Ougi can now kill during the night!

kallenOnDeath.convertmsg: Kallen's defeat marks the turning point of this battle! Orange can now kill during the night!

schneizelOnDeath.detoxmsg: With Schneizel's death, all of his poisons have been averted!

charlesOnDeath.convertmsg: As Charles dies, all of his Brainwashes have been lifted!

variables.you_won: Congratulations! You have cleared your win conditions! You cannot use actions or vote anymore, so you can just sit back and let the remaining players settle their business.

changelog2.April 28, 2015: Suzaku now only evades Kallen's Flight kill in Flight, and Kallen now evades Suzaku's Radiant kill in Radiant.
changelog2.May 7, 2015: Toudou and Xingke no longer die to Inspects. Ougi, Rolo, and Orange have new abilities. Cornelia pierce chance changed.
changelog2.May 14, 2015: Someone who has been brainwashed by Charles can type /reveal to tell him who he brainwashed (his enemies cannot use this).
changelog2.May 19, 2015: Schneizel's PL is higher priority and is no longer completely silent. He also got an Observe (watch+stalk).
changelog2.June 17, 2015: Cornelia can be demoted because it's canon
changelog2.June 21, 2015: Orange and Ougi got new abilities (again!). Orange keeps Revert, but it's also an Inspect on affected roles. Ougi is a Vote inspector. Both gain a kill if Kallen/Suzaku die respectively. Rolo changed, and now has a kill with increasing suicide chance - he also tries to kill C.C. if Distracted, causing him to risk dying. Winners have -99999 voteshield and competing roles have PreventTeamVote on winners.
changelog2.June 23, 2015: Removed Schneizel's hax. Suzaku and Kallen can hax each other when changing forms (very small chance to identify user). Lelouch has hax on both Kallen/Suzaku's forms, as well as on Kill.
changelog2.June 26, 2015: Lelouch can now Protect Any. Lelouch counters daykills. Kallen and Suzaku are more likely to be revealed on daykill. Schneizel /Observe gives the target a +4 voteshield, but his vote is changed to 1. -1 voteshield to Xingke/Toudou. Xingke evades Kallen nightkills, while Toudou evades Suzaku daykills. Lelouch ignores all PLs. Changed 6-7p setup.
changelog2.June 29, 2015: Gameplay extended to 18p - request disable during peak. New roles. Schneizel has /Frame separate from Observe now. Mao is different from his former version. Lelouch does not identify C.C.'s distract. Ougi and Orange gain Protect. Fixed bug where Cornelia wasn't losing vote on kills. Nightkill evades should now appear as Protected (let confused Cornflakes ensue).
changelog2.July 20, 2015: Lelouch hax reduced, while Xingke and Toudou get hax on kill. Kallen/Suzaku hax kill in Recon. Kallen/Suzaku radiant priority switched. Cornelia pierce is now 0%, 25%, 50%, 100%.
changelog2.June 16, 2016: Schneizel is a completely new role. Removed 1.1 vote from Recon and -1 voteshield for Inspectors, and now Radiant has a vote multiplier of 0.5. Lelouch resists poison and hax. Demote is now -3. Ougi+Kallen and Orange+Suzaku begin connected now. Corn final pierce down to 75%.
changelog2.June 21, 2016: Updated /sides. Schneizel evades an expose and loses redirect if exposed as real role. C.C. and Charles can be poisoned. Inspectors no longer see Mecha forms. Orange and Ougi can hax form changes however.

changelog.June 7, 2018: Major sides update, role/spawn tweaks, tutorial added. Schneizel's enemies, Toudou's enemies, Cornelia's enemies, Charles' enemies are changed. Kallen no longer evades Suzaku radiant nightkill as radiant, but still outspeeds it.
changelog.June 20, 2018: Lelouch protect limited to 5 per game, but may be used on same night. Mao cannot be lynched unless he is affected by a Geass. Welcome the NEW XINGKE AND JIGGLYPUFF!
changelog.June 21, 2018: C.C., Villetta, Ougi, and Orange tweaked. Sides tweaked. Spawn 10~13 tweaked. I probably broke something in 14+ but if we get that far let's just enjoy the ride!!
changelog.July 6, 2018: Recon and Radiant forms changes: Recon has voteshield of -1 but no longer appears as 'protected' if someone tries to kill it, just 'evades' Radiant vote is 1, but has a 50% chance to fail and count as 0. Charles' brainwash removes target's voteshield if any. Added Kaguya, Anya, and V.V.. Ougi and Orange evade daykills. Villetta cannot /eliminate n1, but has better hax now. Cornelia has 2 Safeguards per night. Diethard might not work on peak.
changelog.July 28, 2018: Toudou, Xingke cannot daykill if they inspected the previous night.
